products.name: Ore-Ida Zesty Straight Seasoned French Fries Potatoes Gluten Free

extendedInfo.detail: Per 12 Pieces: 140 calories; 1.5 g sat fat (7%DV); 390 mg sodium (17%DV); less than 1 g total sugars.  Gluten free.  Oregon & Idaho. Potatoes done perfect since 1952. During any mealtime, Ore-Ida Potatoes are the right side to have on your side. Ore-Ida believes in potatoes done perfect and it has since 1952. We believe that taste and quality matter, so that's why we work tirelessly to bring you and your family the best and fresh tasting products, all grown locally in the USA. With our perfect Zesty straight fries, you get the crispy outer texture and fluffy inside you need to turn any family meal into a success. So next time you're thinking about what to make, remember that Ore-Ida potatoes are the perfect companion to winning at mealtime. US grown potatoes. Scan here or call 1-800-892-2401 for more food information.  The Ore-Ida Brand is committed to providing the highest quality products. We welcome your comments. Please have the package with you when you call. Phone us: 1-800-892-2401 Monday - Friday. Visit us online: www.oreida.com for delicious recipes. Write us: Kraft Heinz Foods, Consumer Affairs P.O. Box 57 Pittsburgh, PA 15230.
extendedInfo.ingredients: Potatoes, Vegetable Oil Blend (Soybean And Cottonseed), Modified Food Starch, Rice Flour, Corn Flour, Dextrin, Salt, Onion Powder, Capsicum Extract, Chili Pepper, Garlic Powder, Leavening (Sodium Acid Pyrophosphate, Sodium Bicarbonate), Paprika Extract, Spices, Xanthan Gum.
extendedInfo.directions: Bake: Oven Bake: 1/2 Bag Instructions: Serves about 5. (1) Preheat oven to 425 degrees F. (2) Arrange frozen French fries in a single layer on an 11 inches x17 inches baking sheet. (3) Heat for 17-23 mins. Cook to a light golden color. (4) Season to taste. 3/4 Bag Instructions: Serves about 8. (1) Preheat oven to 425 degrees F. (2) Arrange frozen French fries in a single layer on an 11 inches x17 inches baking sheet. (3) Heat for 20-26 mins. Cook to a light golden color. (4) Season to taste. Deep Fry: Deep Fry: Preheat cooking oil in electric deep fryer to 375 degrees F. Fill deep fryer not more than half full of oil. (2) Fill fryer basket not more than half full of frozen French fries. Carefully lower basket into hot oil. (3) Fry 5-7 minutes. Cook to a light golden color. (4) Drain on paper towels. Season to taste. Pan Fry: Pan Fry: (1) Heat 1/2 cup cooking oil in large skillet over medium-high heat. (2) Carefully add frozen French Fries to form a single layer. (3) Fry 7 to 11 minutes, turning frequently. Cook to a light golden color. (4) Drain on paper towels. Season to taste. Cook thoroughly. Keep frozen. Do not overcook. Appliance temperatures may vary. Please consider the performance of your appliance when following these directions. Caution: Ice crystals on frozen foods can lame spattering when added to hot oil. Add product carefully. Tips for Frying with Oil: Always preheat oil uncovered. If oil spatters, cover immediately and reduce heat. When spattering stops, remove cover and return to cooking temperature. Be careful not to spatter or spill oil onto hot burner of range.  Keep frozen.
